## useSearchWithNearMeHandling() function

Returns a search action that will handle near me searches, by first checking for near me intents using an autocomplete request. You can optionally use the provided ref to store autocomplete responses, to avoid making unnecessary autocomplete requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function useSearchWithNearMeHandling(answersActions: AnswersHeadless, geolocationOptions?: PositionOptions, onSearch?: onSearchFunc): [QueryFunc, AutocompleteRef];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  answersActions | AnswersHeadless |  |
|  geolocationOptions | PositionOptions |  |
|  onSearch | [onSearchFunc](./answers-react-components.onsearchfunc.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[[QueryFunc](./answers-react-components.queryfunc.md)<!-- -->, [AutocompleteRef](./answers-react-components.autocompleteref.md)<!-- -->\]
